headline: Hacker News, shut up and take my money
description:
Recently I made a couple of attempts to offer early-stage startups on HN both money (small to medium check sizes) and advice... All attempts yielded pretty much zero responses so far.

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32515303 https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32487830

I've successfully raised capital for my startups in the past (https://medium.com/questmate/how-we-raised-a-us-1-5m-seed-round-at-us-13-5m-using-nothing-but-our-product-ca5215d40a98) and also have a good portfolio of investments into startups either directly or via other people's funds (read: VC) as an LP.

My hypothesis is that, despite economic turndown, investment money is still available in abundance.

So what's yours? Does it sound too good to be true, maybe?
headline_zh-Hans: 黑客新闻，闭嘴，拿我的钱吧
headline_zh-Hant: 黑客新聞，閉嘴，拿我的錢吧
description_zh-Hans:
最近，我做了几次尝试，向HN上的早期创业公司提供资金（小到中等规模的支票）和建议。到目前为止，所有的尝试得到的回应几乎为零。

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32515303 https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32487830

我过去曾成功地为我的初创企业筹集资金（https://medium.com/questmate/how-we-raised-a-us-1-5m-seed-round-at-us-13-5m-using-nothing-but-our-product-ca5215d40a98），也有一个很好的投资组合，直接或通过其他人的基金（阅读：VC）作为LP投资初创企业。

我的假设是，尽管经济下滑，投资资金仍然大量存在。

那么你是什么？这听起来是不是好得不像真的？
description_zh-Hant:
最近，我做了幾次嘗試，向HN上的早期創業公司提供資金（小到中等規模的支票）和建議。到目前為止，所有的嘗試得到的回應幾乎為零。

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32515303 https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32487830

我過去曾成功地為我的初創企業籌集資金（https://medium.com/questmate/how-we-raised-a-us-1-5m-seed-round-at-us-13-5m-using-nothing-but-our-product-ca5215d40a98），也有一個很好的投資組合，直接或通過其他人的基金（閱讀：VC）作為LP投資初創企業。

我的假設是，儘管經濟下滑，投資資金仍然大量存在。

那麼你是什麼？這聽起來是不是好得不像真的？
